Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    org.apache.bookkeeper.conf.ServerConfiguration.getCompactionRate()
    replaced by ServerConfiguration.getCompactionRateByEntries()
    org.apache.bookkeeper.conf.ServerConfiguration.getJournalDirName()
    org.apache.bookkeeper.conf.AbstractConfiguration.getLedgerManagerType()
    replaced by AbstractConfiguration.getLedgerManagerFactoryClass()
    org.apache.bookkeeper.conf.ClientConfiguration.getReadTimeout()
    use ClientConfiguration.getReadEntryTimeout() or ClientConfiguration.getAddEntryTimeout() instead
    org.apache.bookkeeper.conf.ClientConfiguration.getTimeoutTaskIntervalMillis()
    org.apache.bookkeeper.client.BookKeeper.Builder.setEventLoopGroup(EventLoopGroup)
    since 4.5, use BookKeeper.Builder.eventLoopGroup(EventLoopGroup)
    org.apache.bookkeeper.conf.AbstractConfiguration.setLedgerManagerType(String)
    replaced by AbstractConfiguration.setLedgerManagerFactoryClass(java.lang.Class<? extends org.apache.bookkeeper.meta.LedgerManagerFactory>)
    org.apache.bookkeeper.conf.ClientConfiguration.setReadTimeout(int)
    use ClientConfiguration.setReadEntryTimeout(int) or ClientConfiguration.setAddEntryTimeout(int) instead
    org.apache.bookkeeper.conf.ServerConfiguration.setSortedLedgerStorageEnabled(boolean)
    Use ServerConfiguration.setLedgerStorageClass(String) to configure the implementation class
    org.apache.bookkeeper.client.BookKeeper.Builder.setStatsLogger(StatsLogger)
    since 4.5, use BookKeeper.Builder.statsLogger(StatsLogger)
    org.apache.bookkeeper.conf.ClientConfiguration.setTimeoutTaskIntervalMillis(long)
    org.apache.bookkeeper.client.BookKeeper.Builder.setZookeeper(ZooKeeper)
    since 4.5, use BookKeeper.Builder.zk(ZooKeeper)
